scripts.dev: node scripts/bundleElectron.cjs && concurrently "astro dev" "wait-on http://localhost:4321 && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:4321 electron ."
scripts.build: npm run build:web && node scripts/bundleElectron.cjs && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false ELECTRON_BUILDER_DISABLE_CODE_SIGNING=true electron-builder && node scripts/renameArtifacts.cjs
scripts.release: npm run build:web && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false ELECTRON_BUILDER_DISABLE_CODE_SIGNING=true dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --win nsis --publish always
scripts.release:dry: npm run build:web && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --win nsis --publish never
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && node scripts/syncVersion.cjs && git add manifest.json && git commit -m "Sync manifest version" && git push && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && node scripts/syncVersion.cjs && git add manifest.json && git commit -m "Sync manifest version" && git push && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major && node scripts/syncVersion.cjs && git add manifest.json && git commit -m "Sync manifest version" && git push && npm run release
scripts.release:linux: npm run build:web && node scripts/downloadUmu.cjs && node scripts/bundleElectron.cjs && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false ELECTRON_BUILDER_DISABLE_CODE_SIGNING=true dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --linux AppImage deb --publish always --config.publish.provider=github --config.publish.owner=r5valkyrie --config.publish.repo=launcher_linux_releases && node scripts/buildPacman.cjs
